Load libraries
```{r}
library(rethinking)
```


```{r}
sample_mu <- rnorm(1e4, 178, 20)
sample_sd <- runif(1e4, 0, 50)
prior_h <- rnorm(1e4, sample_mu, sample_sd)
dens(prior_h)
```
